tool_description: Books meeting rooms with specified requirements, handles reservations, and manages booking confirmations with optional recurring schedule support.

room_id.description: Unique identifier of the room to book

start_time.description: Booking start time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Booking end time in ISO 8601 format

organizer_email.description: Email address of the meeting organizer

meeting_title.description: Title or subject of the meeting

equipment_requests.description: List of equipment needed for the meeting

recurrence_end.description: End date for recurring bookings in ISO 8601 format

booking_priority.description: Booking priority level (low, normal, high, urgent)

error_messages: Room not available: Specified room is already booked for the requested time slot.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and in valid ISO 8601 format.
Room not found: Specified room_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid organizer email: Organizer email address is not in valid format.
Capacity exceeded: attendee_count exceeds room capacity.
Equipment unavailable: One or more requested equipment items not available.
Invalid recurring pattern: Must be one of none, daily, weekly, monthly.
Recurrence end required: recurrence_end must be specified for recurring bookings.
Invalid priority: booking_priority must be one of low, normal, high, urgent.
Booking conflict: Room has conflicting reservation during specified time.
usage: Provide room ID, time slot, organizer details, and meeting information. Optional parameters include equipment, setup requirements, and recurring patterns. Returns booking confirmation details.

booking_id.description: Unique identifier for the room booking

booking_status.description: Status of the booking (confirmed, pending, failed)

room_details.description: Details about the booked room including location and amenities

total_cost.description: Total cost of the room booking if applicable

recurring_bookings.description: List of booking IDs for recurring meetings
